name: FetchBalance
description: Fetch the balance for an Account based on Account Sid. Balance changes may not be reflected immediately. Child accounts do not contain balance information

AccountSid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account.

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Account.
**balance**: The balance of the Account, in units specified by the unit parameter. Balance changes may not be reflected immediately. Child accounts do not contain balance information
**currency**: The units of currency for the account balance
